Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: cash provided by used in financing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payment for contingent consideration liability financing activities
payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
proceeds from derivative instrument financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of commercial paper
proceeds from issuance of long term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
Repayment of Debt: payments for deposits applied to debt retirements
repayments of other long term debt
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): atheros acquisition net of cash acquired
other investments and acquisitions net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire other productive assets
Net Cash from Investing Activities: cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from collection of other receivables
proceeds from sale of intangible assets
proceeds from sale of other assets
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Purchases of Investments: payments to acquire available for sale securities
payments to acquire trading securities heldforinvestment
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale and maturity of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale and maturity of marketable securities
proceeds from sale and maturity of other investments
proceeds from sale and maturity of trading securities heldforinvestment
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale of other investments
proceeds from sale of trading securities heldforinvestment

Net Change in Cash: cash and cash equivalents held for sale period increase decrease
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable trade
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in securities lending payable
Interest Paid: interest expense in excess of less than interest payments
Net Cash from Operating Activities: cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: discontinued operation gain loss from disposal of discontinued operation before income tax
gain loss on disposition of intangible assets
gain loss on investments excluding other than temporary impairments
gain loss on sale of other assets
impairment losses on other investments without readily determinable fair value
income tax provision less than in excess of income tax payments
other than temporary impairment losses investments portion recognized in earnings net
Stock-Based Compensation: excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities

__unmapped__: acquisitions and other investments netof cash acquired
revenues related to non monetary exchanges
